Pre-Game Insights: Australia will clash against Afghanistan in Group 1 match in Super 12 of T20 World Cup 2022.
Australia requires a huge win against Afghanistan, who are yet to win a match in this World Cup.
Aaron Finch and Tim David aren't fully fit, but Australian skipper Aaron Finch may still take the field despite a sore hamstring.
All-rounder Marcus Stoinis also had a niggle and thus didn't take the field during Australia's last match.
Afghanistan has already been eliminated from the tournament and would look to end their campaign on a high with a win against the defending champions.
